name: CUSTOMProduct Ingredients #2
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy

  assign body_gap_mobile = section.settings.body_gap_mobile
  assign body_gap = section.settings.body_gap

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile
  assign heading_mt_mobile = section.settings.heading_mt_mobile
  assign heading_mt = section.settings.heading_mt

  assign text = section.settings.text
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_align = section.settings.text_align
  assign text_align_mobile = section.settings.text_align_mobile
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile
  assign text_bottom_mobile = section.settings.text_bottom_mobile

  assign items_align_mobile = section.settings.items_align_mobile
  assign items_align = section.settings.items_align
  assign items_gap = section.settings.items_gap
  assign items_gap_mobile = section.settings.items_gap_mobile
  assign items_mt = section.settings.items_mt
  assign items_mt_mobile = section.settings.items_mt_mobile

  assign item_size = section.settings.item_size
  assign item_size_mobile = section.settings.item_size_mobile
  assign item_custom = section.settings.item_custom
  assign item_color = section.settings.item_color
  assign item_hover_color = section.settings.item_hover_color
  assign item_font = section.settings.item_font
  assign item_height = section.settings.item_height
  assign item_padding_vertical = section.settings.item_padding_vertical
  assign item_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.item_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign item_padding_horizontal = section.settings.item_padding_horizontal
  assign item_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.item_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign item_radius = section.settings.item_radius
  assign item_border_thickness = section.settings.item_border_thickness
  assign item_border_color = section.settings.item_border_color
  assign item_border_hover_color = section.settings.item_border_hover_color
  assign item_bg_color = section.settings.item_bg_color
  assign item_bg_hover_color = section.settings.item_bg_hover_color

  assign button = section.settings.button
  assign button_url = section.settings.button_url
  assign button_size = section.settings.button_size
  assign button_size_mobile = section.settings.button_size_mobile
  assign button_custom = section.settings.button_custom
  assign button_color = section.settings.button_color
  assign button_hover_color = section.settings.button_hover_color
  assign button_font = section.settings.button_font
  assign button_height = section.settings.button_height
  assign button_align = section.settings.button_align
  assign button_align_mobile = section.settings.button_align_mobile
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_bottom_mobile = section.settings.button_bottom_mobile

  assign slider_width_mobile = section.settings.slider_width_mobile
  assign slider_width = section.settings.slider_width
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap

  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color

  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_align = section.settings.title_align
  assign title_align_mobile = section.settings.title_align_mobile

  assign card_text_size = section.settings.card_text_size
  assign card_text_size_mobile = section.settings.card_text_size_mobile
  assign card_text_color = section.settings.card_text_color
  assign card_text_custom = section.settings.card_text_custom
  assign card_text_font = section.settings.card_text_font
  assign card_text_height = section.settings.card_text_height
  assign card_text_align = section.settings.card_text_align
  assign card_text_align_mobile = section.settings.card_text_align_mobile
  assign card_text_mt = section.settings.card_text_mt

  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_width = section.settings.image_width
  assign image_width_mobile = section.settings.image_width_mobile
  assign image_align = section.settings.image_align
  assign image_align_mobile = section.settings.image_align_mobile
  assign image_mt = section.settings.image_mt
  assign hide_image = section.settings.hide_image

  assign navigation_mt = section.settings.navigation_mt
  assign navigation_mt_mobile = section.settings.navigation_mt_mobile
  assign navigation_gap_mobile = section.settings.navigation_gap_mobile
  assign navigation_gap = section.settings.navigation_gap

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile

  assign dots_size = section.settings.dots_size
  assign dots_size_mobile = section.settings.dots_size_mobile
  assign dots_show_desktop = section.settings.dots_show_desktop
  assign dots_show_mobile = section.settings.dots_show_mobile
  assign dots_color = section.settings.dots_color
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  item_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  card_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .ingredients-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr);
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ body_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ heading_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

   .ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .ingredients-items-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ items_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: {{ items_align_mobile }};
    gap: {{ items_gap_mobile }}px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .ingredients-item-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    max-width: fit-content;
    font-size: {{ item_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ item_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ item_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ item_radius }}px;
    color: {{ item_color }};
    border: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ item_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    opacity: 0.8;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .ingredients-item-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-item-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    opacity: 1;
    color: {{ item_hover_color }};
    border: {{ item_border_thickness }}px solid {{ item_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ item_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ button_size_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: {{ button_height }}%;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    color: {{ button_color }};
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ button_hover_color }};
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: {{ slider_width_mobile }}%;
    margin: 0px auto;
  }

  .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    box-sizing: border-box !important; 
    height: auto !important;
  }

  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0;
    text-align: {{ title_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ card_text_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    text-align: {{ card_text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ card_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ card_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ card_text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ image_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: {{ image_width_mobile }}%;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}%;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #FAFAFA;
  }

  .ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ navigation_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: {{ navigation_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static;
    z-index: 2;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 0px !important;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 0px !important;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    margin-left: 3px;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg {
    transform: rotate(180deg);
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.3;
  }

  .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    position: static !important;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
    width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ dots_color }};
    opacity: 0.6;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .ingredients-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: calc({{ 100 | minus: slider_width }}% - {{ body_gap | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px) calc({{ slider_width }}% - {{ body_gap | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}px);
      gap: {{ body_gap }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }

    .ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }
    
    .ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} *{
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-items-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ items_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ items_align }};
      gap: {{ items_gap }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ item_padding_vertical }}px {{ item_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ item_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ button_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 100%;
    }

    .ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ title_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ card_text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_text_align }};
    }
  
    .ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ card_text_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: {{ image_width }}%;
    }

    .ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet {
      width: {{ dots_size }}px;
      height: {{ dots_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if item_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-item-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ item_font.family }}, {{ item_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ item_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ item_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_font.family }}, {{ button_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ card_text_font.family }}, {{ card_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ card_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ card_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
   .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% elsif button_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
   .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif button_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/11; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/11; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/7; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_align_mobile == "center" %}
  <style>
   .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% elsif image_align_mobile == "right" %}
  <style>
   .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: auto;
    } 
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_align == "center" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_align == "right" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
        margin-left: 0px;
        margin-right: 0px;
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dots_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_bottom_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-text-top-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
    
    .ingredients-text-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-text-top-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block;
      }
      
      .ingredients-text-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_bottom_mobile %}
  <style>
    .ingredients-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
    
    .ingredients-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .ingredients-button-top-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block;
      }
      
      .ingredients-button-bottom-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} ingredients-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="ingredients-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="ingredients-content-{{ section.id }}">

          {% if heading != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if text != blank %}
            <div class="ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} {% if text_bottom_mobile %}ingredients-text-top-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">{{ text }}</div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if section.blocks.size > 0 %}
            <div class="ingredients-items-{{ section.id }}">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <p class="ingredients-item-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          {% endif %}

          {% if button != blank %}
            <a href="{{ button_url }}" class="ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} {% if button_bottom_mobile %}ingredients-button-top-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
              {{ button }}
            </a>
          {% endif %}
          
        </div>
        <div class="ingredients-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <div class="ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                    <h3 class="ingredients-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</h3>
                  {% endif %}
                
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="ingredients-card-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text}}</div>
                  {% endif %}

                  {% unless hide_image %}
                    <div class="ingredients-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}lazy="loading"{% endif %}/>
                      {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  {% endunless %}
                
                </div>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="ingredients-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
            <button class="ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
              	 width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
              	 xml:space="preserve">
              	<path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
              		l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
              		c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
              		C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
              
              </svg>
            </button>
            <div class="ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }} swiper-pagination"></div>
            <button class="ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
              	 width="307.046px" height="307.046px" viewBox="0 0 307.046 307.046" style="enable-background:new 0 0 307.046 307.046;"
              	 xml:space="preserve">
              	<path d="M281.828,142.427L144.002,4.597c-6.129-6.129-16.07-6.129-22.199,0l-11.101,11.101c-6.133,6.133-6.133,16.076,0,22.201
              		l92.071,92.077H36.321c-8.668,0-15.701,7.035-15.701,15.701v15.699c0,8.664,7.033,15.701,15.701,15.701h166.445l-92.063,92.059
              		c-6.133,6.136-6.133,16.086,0,22.209l11.101,11.101c6.129,6.136,16.07,6.136,22.199,0l137.826-137.831
              		C287.959,158.487,287.959,148.556,281.828,142.427z"/>
              
              </svg>
            </button>
          </div>
      </div>

      {% if text_bottom_mobile and text != blank %}
        <div class="ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} ingredients-text-bottom-{{ section.id }}">{{ text }}</div>
      {% endif %}

      {% if button_bottom_mobile and button != blank %}
        <a href="{{ button_url }}" class="ingredients-button-{{ section.id }} ingredients-button-bottom-{{ section.id }}">
          {{ button }}
        </a>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initProductIngredients2() {

    const ingredientsItems{{ section.id | replace: '-','' }} = document.querySelectorAll('.ingredients-item-{{ section.id }}');

    ingredientsItems{{ section.id | replace: '-','' }}.forEach((item, index) => {
      item.addEventListener('click', function () {
        const clickedIndex = index;
  
        slider.slideTo(clickedIndex);
  
        updateActiveIngredientsItem(clickedIndex);
      });
    });
  
    function updateActiveIngredientsItem(index) {
      ingredientsItems{{ section.id | replace: '-','' }}.forEach(item => {
        item.classList.remove('active');
      });
      ingredientsItems{{ section.id | replace: '-','' }}[index].classList.add('active');
    }
    
    const slider = new Swiper('.ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}', {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
      pagination: {
        el: '.ingredients-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: "bullets",
        clickable: true
      },
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}'
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          updateActiveIngredientsItem(this.activeIndex);
        }
      }
    })
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProductIngredients2);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initProductIngredients2);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initProductIngredients2);
  }
  
</script>

text.default: We carefully selected plant-based ingredients to create the world's healthiest protein coffee that's low in sugar, high in protein, and tastes delicious.
text.label: Text

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
